summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 8, Denny-Fuhrman Addition, being the alley between Harvard Avenue North and North Broadway, from Roanoke Street to Edgar Street; all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 77119, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
